mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_incoming (inco_code, store_info_code, article_code, cust_code, inco_vat_type, inco_pay_type, inco_total, inco_count, inco_volume_subtotal, inco_supply_value, inco_tax, inco_dealing_group_code, inco_stock_group_code, inco_date, inco_reg_date, inco_deadline, inco_system_id, inco_system_name, inco_check) VALUES (sf_new_inco_code(), #{storeInfoCode}, #{articleCode}, #{custCode}, #{incoVatType}, #{incoPayType}, #{incoTotal} ,#{incoCount}, #{incoVolumeSubtotal}, #{incoSupplyValue}, #{incoTax}, '', '', #{incoDate}, NOW(), '', '', '', 1)
mapper.select: SELECT i.inco_code, i.store_info_code, i.article_code, a.article_name, i.cust_code, c.cust_name, i.inco_vat_type, i.inco_pay_type, i.inco_total, i.inco_count, i.inco_volume_subtotal, i.inco_supply_value, i.inco_tax, i.inco_dealing_group_code, i.inco_stock_group_code, i.inco_date, i.inco_reg_date, i.inco_deadline, i.inco_system_id, i.inco_system_name, i.inco_check FROM tb_incoming AS i LEFT JOIN tb_customer AS c ON i.cust_code = c.cust_code LEFT JOIN tb_article AS a ON i.article_code = a.article_code WHERE i.store_info_code = #{SSTORECODE} AND i.inco_deadline = 'x';

SELECT i.inco_code, i.store_info_code, i.article_code, a.article_name, i.cust_code, c.cust_name, i.inco_vat_type, i.inco_pay_type, i.inco_total, i.inco_count, i.inco_volume_subtotal, i.inco_supply_value, i.inco_tax, i.inco_dealing_group_code, i.inco_stock_group_code, i.inco_date, i.inco_reg_date, i.inco_deadline, i.inco_system_id, i.inco_system_name, i.inco_check FROM tb_incoming AS i LEFT JOIN tb_customer AS c ON i.cust_code = c.cust_code LEFT JOIN tb_article AS a ON i.article_code = a.article_code WHERE i.store_info_code = #{SSTORECODE} AND i.article_code = #{articleCode};

SELECT i.inco_code, i.store_info_code, i.article_code, a.article_name, i.cust_code, c.cust_name, i.inco_vat_type, i.inco_pay_type, i.inco_total, i.inco_count, i.inco_volume_subtotal, i.inco_supply_value, i.inco_tax, i.inco_dealing_group_code, i.inco_stock_group_code, i.inco_date, i.inco_reg_date, i.inco_deadline, i.inco_system_id, i.inco_system_name, i.inco_check FROM tb_incoming AS i LEFT JOIN tb_customer AS c ON i.cust_code = c.cust_code LEFT JOIN tb_article AS a ON i.article_code = a.article_code WHERE i.store_info_code = #{SSTORECODE};
